name: Legs.
description:
Legs. is an experimental 2D platformer including charming (?) programmer art and wonky controls, and was made by Jan Plähn.

The player takes their legs for a stroll at the beach to reach the sea and go for a swim. But watch out! Sea urchins and crabs are nothing you want to step on!

Controls

WASD / Arrow Keys / Left Joystick:   Move Legs

Credits

This game was made by Jan Plähn for the Game Jam "I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game Again" in one week time. Legs. uses a few royalty free music, fonts and sounds. For a full list of the used assets, please download the credits.
